Description:
Checking and Confirming of Project Logs.
Evaluating the company's project log through in-depth verification of all the parameters.
Keeping QA dashboards up-to-date with relevant KPIs and other project-centric technical details.
Prepare inspection request documents for products through proper categorization.Skills
Skills:
Knowledgeable in AutoCAD.

Graduate degree holder in Mechanical Engineering with a keen interest in Quality Control.
Hands-on experience in MS Office software and other applications.
